metadata.description: BitMart BlackFriday Collection is to celebrate the 2022 BlackFriday. One NFT Mystery Box for 5 USDT that contains a mystery prize which can be traded on the NFT Marketplace before being opened; If users open it, users will get at least 7 USDT worth of token as a reward; Once the Mystery Box is opened, the rewards assets will be credited to the user's account, the Mystery Box NFT will be burned.
